job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: this innovative ai start up is looking for a site reliability engineer to join their growing team the company monitors ai after it is live to track any discrepancies or biases that hadnt been recognized already they have their series a and set up for a lot of growth and successltbrgtltbrgtas an sre you will be heavily leveraging kubernetes and working closely with the data and machine learning teams you will be interacting with a variety of infrastructures depending the user so familiarity with both cloud and on premise will be helpfulltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtrequired skills ampamp experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt years of relevant experienceltligt ltligtexperience with kubernetesltligt ltligtexperience working with big data andor machine learningltligt ltligtfamiliarity with both cloud and data center infrastructuresltligt ltbrgtltulgtthe offerltbrgtltulgt ltligtcompetitive salary up to kyear doeltligt ltligtbonus ltligt ltligtequityltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtyou will receive the following benefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtmedical insurance ampamp health savings account hsaltligt ltligtkltligt ltligtpaid sick time leaveltligt ltligtpretax commuter benefitltligt ltbrgtltulgtapplicants must be currently authorized to work in the united states on a fulltime basis now and in the futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtposted byltstronggt jordan taylor
